dmca.title: Aversion Media averse to blogger's copying
dmca.body:
It has come to our attention that one of the blogs hosted on Blogspot servers, indiesurfer.blogspot.com, has reproduced copyrighted materials from Aversion's servers without permission.

The stolen material is a reproduction of news stories on recording artists and new releases published between January 1, 1007 and February 23, 2007:

http://www.aversion.com/news/news_article.cfm?news_id=8122
http://www.aversion.com/news/news_article.cfm?news_id=8143
http://www.aversion.com/news/news_article.cfm?news_id=8158

The infringing pieces, appears on indiesurfer.blogspot.com servers at

http://indiesurfer.blogspot.com/2007/02/news_23.html

http://indiesurfer.blogspot.com/2007/02/news.html

http://indiesurfer.blogspot.com/2007_01_01_archive.html

We believe this situation is very serious as the infringing use supplants demand for our original work, which interferes with our ability to generate advertising revenue. This may put your ISP in a position of potential liability; because you own this IP address, we request that you immediately do the following:

1) Disable access to the site engaged in the conduct described above; and

2) Take appropriate action against the account holder (if other than the individual whose access has been disabled) under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement.

Under our reading of
